title: [管理][娱乐]LeTroll——指令惩罚玩家[1.7.2-1.11]
author: SolitudeFou
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SolitudeFou 于 2017-8-30 21:48 编辑 
LeTroll指令惩罚插件
————————————————————————————————
搬运授权





J)8JUWKJNIJ(Q1@20L4YR.png (18.85 KB, 下载次数: 6)

下载附件

2017-8-30 19:30 上传




————————————————————————————————作者原话This is an all in one trolling/punishing plugin which is still under development and will have many features to come. LeTroll, a project started back in 2014. Rewritten numerous times but never really felt like this project was the best it could be. So 3 years later when I stumbled upon this project again, I decided to rewrite it once more. A new major feature was added. A GUI to issue trolls / punishments to players. This provides a user-friendly experience to any staff that are wanting to troll / punish their players. It's extremely light-weight and easy to install.
————————————————————————————————介绍这款插件是使用简易的指令对玩家进行惩罚 目前惩罚方法较少————————————————————————————————特点1.插件较小 30KB左右 √2.指令较短 √3.部分版本带Gui界面 √————————————————————————————————指令/lt 丨查看关于该插件的所有指令
